name: Responsa Project Online (Global Jewish Database)
description: A collection of Torah literature and Jewish texts in Hebrew. Covers thousands of years of Jewish learning, including numerous works from the Responsa literature, the Bible and the Talmud, works about Jewish law and customs, and the major codes of Jewish law (such as Maimonides' Mishneh Torah and the Shulḥan ʻarukh, with its principal commentaries). Also includes the Entsiḳlopedyah Talmudit.
